/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall and proud, their facades reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the vibrancy and energy of the city.
